definition: Houhai, a lake and the area surrounding it in central Beijing
ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous

sentences.english: Ellen:I think you can take them for a stroll around Wangfujing and Houhai.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得还可以带他们去王府井和后海逛逛。

sentences.english: We went to a very nice restaurant in Houhai.
sentences.chinese: 我们去了在后海的一家非常别致的餐馆。

sentences.english: Houhai is a popular area for bars and restaurants.
sentences.chinese: 后海的酒吧和餐馆非常受欢迎。

sentences.english: Sue, let's meet this evening and go for a walk around Houhia Lake.
sentences.chinese: 苏，咱们今晚见面，然后绕后海散散步。

sentences.english: This graduate of Beijing Film Academy owns a bar nearby Houhai.
sentences.chinese: 这个北京电影学院毕业的女孩在后海附近开了个酒吧。

sentences.english: Then we can take a taxi to Houhai.
sentences.chinese: 然后我们可以乘出租车去后海。

sentences.english: We can have dinner on the lake at Houhai.
sentences.chinese: 我们可以在后海的湖上就餐。

sentences.english: Houhai lake in Central are sold Mala Tang, business everywhere ah.
sentences.chinese: 后海的湖中央有卖麻辣烫，生意无处不在啊。

definition: Shichahai, scenic area of northwest Beijing with three lakes
Jingshan (name of a hill in Jingshan park)
abbr. for 北京工人體育場|北京工人体育场[Bei3 jing1 Gong1 ren2 Ti3 yu4 chang3], Workers Stadium
a drum tower/Drum Tower, historic attraction in Xian, Beijing etc
